greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 2 + 2*sqrt(2).
comment: Side length of smallest square containing five circles of radius 1. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 05 2011
Equals n + n/(n +n/(n +n/(n +....))) for n = 4.  See also A090388. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Jan 23 2014
Also the area of a regular octagon with unit edge length. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Apr 12 2015
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: Felix Tubiana (fat2(AT)columbia.edu), Feb 05 2004
ext: Better definition from _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jul 02 2004
